entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
